author: By Lilit Marcus, CNN
title: The Hong Kong hotel weathering the coronavirus storm
description: Lantau is Hong Kong's largest island, home to three of its busiest spots -- Hong Kong Disneyland, the Tian Tan Buddha and Chep Lak Kok Airport.
content:
Tai O, Hong Kong (CNN) Lantau is Hong Kong's largest island, home to three of its busiest spots -- Hong Kong Disneyland, the Tian Tan Buddha and Chep Lak Kok Airport. 
But on the island's western tip, on a spit of land that curls into the South China Sea, is… [+3650 chars]
